hero.title: We'll Help You Navigate
hero.description: Insurance paperwork is confusing, frustrating, and sometimes feels designed to make you give up. We won't let that happen. We'll help you get the coverage your family deserves.

honestTalk.title: Let's Be Honest About Insurance
paragraphs: Dealing with insurance for home health care is a nightmare. The denials, the prior authorizations, the endless phone calls, the forms that ask the same questions seventeen different ways—it's exhausting.

You're already managing your loved one's medical needs, coordinating appointments, and trying to keep your family functioning. The last thing you need is to become an expert in insurance billing codes.
That's where we come in. We've been doing this for years, and we know how to get approvals, fight denials, and navigate the system. You shouldn't have to do this alone.

insurancePrograms.title: Payment & Insurance Options
insurancePrograms.subtitle: We work with Private Pay, GAPP, and various insurance plans to provide skilled nursing care for families in Greater Atlanta.

programs.name: Private Pay
programs.description: We offer flexible private pay options for families seeking high-quality care without going through insurance or waiver programs.

programs.name: GAPP
programs.description: A Medicaid program providing private home care for disabled children ages 5-21 who qualify for skilled and non-skilled home care.

programs.name: Insurance
programs.description: We work with various private insurance plans to cover skilled nursing and home care services.

howWeHelp.title: We Handle the Logistics
howWeHelp.subtitle: How We Help You Navigate Payments

steps.title: We Check Your Eligibility
steps.description: Not sure if your loved one qualifies for GAPP or if your insurance covers our services? We'll review your situation and let you know. No guessing, no wasted time.

steps.title: We Complete the Paperwork
steps.description: Application forms and insurance verification can be daunting. We'll help you navigate the documentation needed to get care started smoothly.

steps.title: We Coordinate with Payers
steps.description: Whether it's GAPP or your private insurance, we handle the coordination and communication to ensure services are authorized and active.

steps.title: We Handle All Billing
steps.description: For GAPP and insurance, we bill directly. For private pay, we provide clear, itemized invoices. Your job is to focus on your loved one—not on medical bills.

steps.title: We Maintain Coverage
steps.description: Renewals and updated care plans—we track the requirements to make sure your care doesn't lapse. You have enough to remember without adding administrative deadlines to the list.

questions.question: What if my loved one doesn't qualify for GAPP or have private insurance?
questions.answer: We offer private pay options for families who need care but aren't eligible for GAPP or other covered programs. Let's talk about your specific situation to find a solution that works for you.

questions.question: How long does the approval process take?
questions.answer: It varies, but typically 2-6 weeks for GAPP applications. For insurance and private pay, we can often get started much sooner once the initial assessment and verification are complete.

questions.question: What if my insurance denies coverage?
questions.answer: Denials happen—often because the documentation didn't emphasize the right details. We know how to provide the information insurance companies need to see the medical necessity for care.

questions.question: Will I have out-of-pocket costs?
questions.answer: For families qualified under GAPP, there are typically zero out-of-pocket costs. For private insurance, it depends on your specific plan's deductibles and co-pays. For private pay, we provide a clear rate schedule so there are no surprises.

cta.title: Let's Figure Out Your Insurance Together
cta.description: Call us and we'll walk you through your options. We'll check eligibility, explain the process, and help you get started. No confusing jargon, no pressure—just honest help.
